articles.author: Jim VandeHei, Mike Allen
articles.title: Behind the Curtain: Trump bets his presidency and GOP's future on AI - Axios
articles.description: He won on the backs of working-class MAGA. But he surrounds himself with tech moguls.
articles.content:
President Trump is betting his presidency and the future of the GOP on lightly regulated, fast expansion of AI.
Why it matters: Yes, Trump zigs and zags into countless political and diplomatic issue… [+4656 chars]

articles.author: Mara Johnson-Groh, Simons Foundation
articles.title: Scientists Finally Explain Mysterious “Impossible” Merger of Two Massive Black Holes - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A detailed suite of simulations conducted by astrophysicists at the Flatiron Institute and their collaborators showed that magnetic fields can produce black holes with masses that were previously believed to be mostly unattainable. In 2023, astronomers record…
articles.content: Astronomers have finally uncovered a surprising mechanism behind a record-setting black hole collision detected in 2023, revealing that powerful magnetic fields may shape the birth and spin of unusua… [+7321 chars]
